title: The Poppy War
author: R.F. Kuang
war_conflict: Second Sino-Japanese War and Chinese Civil War
synopsis: 'The Poppy War' by R.F. Kuang is a military fantasy that unfolds against the backdrop of Second Sino-Japanese War and Chinese Civil War. Set in China, it explores the human spirit amid turmoil — weaving themes of sacrifice, courage, and the enduring impact of war on individuals and societies.
